episode_event_ch0336_00_mimoza/4001_1001:
Chuck—that guy I met the other day—just
dropped by to give me some Pasio
chocolates!

I already bought some for myself, so you
and Rosa should go halfsies on these!
episode_event_ch0336_00_mimoza/4001_1101:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Rosa each
received half of the Pasio chocolates!
episode_event_ch0336_00_mimoza/4001_1001: Oh wow, this is luxury. I’m so happy.

Once you’ve replenished your sugar
reserves, you’d better start on your
schoolwork!

I’ve gotta study up on battling as a sync
pair—and on teaching at Pasio Academy.
I have so much to learn!

Teaching sure seems like a lot of work,
Ms. Miriam!
But actually, I’m glad it is.

This was my dream, and it finally came
true because I didn’t give up.

And I’m gonna roll up my sleeves and take it
as far as I can!
So I’ve totally got your backs!

When it’s my time to shine on Pasio,
you should cheer me on,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
